about:
Khelifi Assil 
 Full stack javascript developer | Flutter | Rectjs | Vuejs | Nodejs


 Full Stack Developer with more than 3 years of experience of designing and building Web and Mobile applications and ensuring code quality, With vast array of knowledge in many different front end and back end languages, responsive frameworks, databases ( Nodejs, Reactjs , Vuejs, Python, React-native, Bootstrap, Flutter, Dart ..). Compromised to learn and improve every day my hard/soft skills..
